var d;
d := 17;
var r;
r := 5;
var y;
read y;
var z;
read z;
while y != 0 do
    var x;
    x := y + z;
    var a;
    a := 3;
    var j;
    j := 1;
    var b;
    while j != 100 do
        var k;
        k := a + z;
        b := j * z;
        d := (y + z) * d;
        var e;
        e := (x + z) * r;
        j := j + 1;
    end
    var c;
    c := a + y;
    var m;
    m := y * b;
    var n;
    n := r * y;
    write n;
    y := y - 1;
end
